interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sing
Review Date: 2018/01/20
Store: Matthew McConaughey  (Actor),     Reese Witherspoon  (Actor),     Garth Jennings  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy
Product Description: ["From Illumination Entertainment, the studio that brought you The Secret Life of Pets comes an animated comedy about finding the music that lives inside all of us. Sing stars Academy Award winner Matthew McConaughey as Buster Moon, an eternally optimistic koala who puts on the world's greatest singing competition to save his crumbling theater; Academy Award winner Reese Witherspoon as Rosita, an overworked and underappreciated mother of 25 piglets desperate to unleash her inner diva; Scarlett Johansson as Ash, a punk rock porcupine with a beautiful voice behind her prickly exterior; and Taron Egerton as Johnny, a young gangster gorilla looking to break free of his family's felonies. Sing is the musical comedy event of the year!Bonus Content:", 'The Making of Sing', 'The Making of Sing', 'Finding the Rhythm: Editing Sing', 'Finding the Rhythm: Editing Sing', 'Character Profiles', 'Character Profiles', '"Don\'t You Worry \'Bout a Thing" Music Video', '"Don\'t You Worry \'Bout a Thing" Music Video', 'Making a Music Video with Tori Kelly', 'Making a Music Video with Tori Kelly', '"Faith" Music Video', '"Faith" Music Video', '"Faith" Lyric Video', '"Faith" Lyric Video', '"Set\xa0It All Free" Lyric Video', '"Set\xa0It All Free" Lyric Video', 'Sing & Dance! - "Faith"', 'Sing & Dance! - "Faith"', 'The Sing Network', 'The Sing Network', 'The Best of Gunter', 'The Best of Gunter', '"Gunter Babysits" Mini-Movie', '"Gunter Babysits" Mini-Movie', '"Love At First Sight" Mini-Movie', '"Love At First Sight" Mini-Movie', '"Eddie\'s Life Coach" Mini Movie', '"Eddie\'s Life Coach" Mini Movie', 'The Making of the Mini-Movies', 'The Making of the Mini-Movies']
Average Rating: 4.8

["From Illumination Entertainment, the studio that brought you The Secret Life of Pets comes an animated comedy about finding the music that lives inside all of us. Sing stars Academy Award winner Matthew McConaughey as Buster Moon, an eternally optimistic koala who puts on the world's greatest singing competition to save his crumbling theater; Academy Award winner Reese Witherspoon as Rosita, an overworked and underappreciated mother of 25 piglets desperate to unleash her inner diva; Scarlett Johansson as Ash, a punk rock porcupine with a beautiful voice behind her prickly exterior; and Taron Egerton as Johnny, a young gangster gorilla looking to break free of his family's felonies. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Main Interests:** Animated family movies, comedies, musicals, and performing arts.
- **Preferred Content:** Engaging, light-hearted stories with musical elements and relatable characters. 
- **Audience Engagement:** Enjoys movies that are entertaining and fun for all ages, indicating a family-oriented viewing preference.
- **Rating Behavior:** High ratings (4.8 average) suggest a tendency to appreciate quality storytelling and production value.
- **Purchase Patterns:** Demonstrates a consistent interest in acquiring products that provide enjoyment and a shared experience, particularly in the realm of animated features.
- **Community Engagement:** Engages with content that includes notable actors and directors, highlighting a preference for well-known talent and recognized production teams.

Overall, this user favors uplifting and entertaining films that can be enjoyed by both themselves and others, especially family-oriented narratives featuring humor and music.
